Packagist updated their download statistics, which make this project redundant. Check out Laravel's download statistics on packagist.org .

March 2018

Laravel v5.5 was the most popular version in March 2018. It has been downloaded 592'937 times. That's 35.2% of all downloads!

In total, Laravel has been downloaded 1'685'377 times this month.

How are these numbers calculated?
